inputs.name: Repository
inputs.label: Build Infrastructure Source
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Repository which contains the Build Infrastructure tool chain to use.
You can also specify a custom http git repository or a UNC path which is useful for rapid testing.
If using a UNC path it must point to the root folder e.g. \<machine>\c$\Source\Build.Infrastructure\

inputs.name: Branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch in Build.Infrastructure you want to use.

inputs.name: CustomSource
inputs.label: Repository or Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The custom repository address or path to the the tool chain you want to use.
